title: OpenAI is growing fast and burning through piles of money
description: OpenAI's monthly revenue hit $300 mn in August, up 1,700% since the beginning of 2023, and the company expects about $3.7 bn in annual sales this year, according to financial documents reviewed by The New York Times. OpenAI estimates that its revenue will balloon to $11.6 bn next year.
content: OpenAI, the San Francisco startup behind ChatGPT, has been telling investors that it is making billions from its chatbot and that it expects to make a lot more in the coming years. But it has not been quite so clear about how much it is losing.
